member.name: T:Horseshoe.NET.Application.AppMode
member.summary: The execution environment in which this app is running e.g. Development, Test, Production, etc. May be assigned manually or in the configuration file.

member.name: F:Horseshoe.NET.Application.AppMode.Development

member.name: F:Horseshoe.NET.Application.AppMode.Test
member.summary: Internal (possibly informal) testing environment

member.name: F:Horseshoe.NET.Application.AppMode.IA

member.name: F:Horseshoe.NET.Application.AppMode.QA
member.summary: Quality Assurance - internal formal testing environment

member.name: F:Horseshoe.NET.Application.AppMode.UAT
member.summary: User Acceptance Testing - formal (possibly external) testing environment

member.name: F:Horseshoe.NET.Application.AppMode.Training
member.summary: Training - separate from (but supposedly identical to) production with separate data

member.name: F:Horseshoe.NET.Application.AppMode.Production
member.summary: Production environment

member.summary: Render details "as is"

member.name: F:Horseshoe.NET.Bootstrap.AlertMessageDetailsRenderingPolicy.EncodeHtml
member.summary: Display HTML markup rather than honor it

member.name: F:Horseshoe.NET.Bootstrap.AlertMessageDetailsRenderingPolicy.PreFormatted
member.summary: Honor spaces and line breaks (useful for rendering exceptions)

member.name: F:Horseshoe.NET.Bootstrap.AlertMessageDetailsRenderingPolicy.Hidden

member.summary: Render exception details to a nonvisible element only

member.name: F:Horseshoe.NET.Bootstrap.ExceptionRenderingPolicy.Dynamic
member.summary: Render exception details only if in Development (see Horseshoe.NET AppMode), otherwise do not (requires configuration i.e. in app|web.config or appsettings.json set Horseshoe.NET:AppMode)
